mapper.sql: id, phone, password, company_name, province, city, district, town, identity, status, explain ,gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, phone, password, company_name, province, city, district, town, identity, status, explain, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{explain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

phone,
password,
company_name,
province,

district,
town,

explain,
gmt_create,

mapper.update:
update user
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
town = #{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identity = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
explain = #{explain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, town = #{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, explain = #{explain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id,phone,password from user where phone=#{phone} and `status` = '0'
